thumb.description: The Last Songã‚¢ã‚¹ãƒ•ã‚¡ãƒ«ãƒˆã‚’æŸ“ã‚ã‚‹èŒœè‰²ãƒ“ãƒ«ã®éš™é–“ã«æ¶ˆãˆã‚‹å¤ªé™½å­ä¾›ãŸã¡ã®å£°ãŒé ã–ã‹ã‚‹å¤‰ã‚ã‚‰ãªã„è¡—ä¸¦ã¿éãå»ã£ãŸæ—¥ã€…ã‚’é‡ã­ã¦æ˜æ—¥ã¸å‘ã‹ã†ä¸–ç´€æœ«ã®å¤•ç„¼ã‘ç©ºå¸Œæœ›ã¨ä¸å®‰ãŒå…¥ã‚Šæ··ã˜ã‚‹æœªæ¥ã¸ã®æ‰‰ã‚’æ¬¡ã®ä¸–ç•Œã‚’ä¿¡ã˜ã¦ã¿ãŸã„The crimson color of the asphalt, the sun disappearing between the buildings, the voices of children fading away, the streets are unchanged, but I feel something is different, stacking up the days gone by, I dream of tomorrow, the evening sky at the end of the century, hope and anxiety mixed together, but I still want to believe, so let's open the door to the futureMusic,Lyric,All Sound Prog : Sonata
